languages.text: "О Иша, Мать всех живых, да защитит твое благословение Детей Азуриана от мерзости телесных и духовных мук..." {n}Подрагивающей рукой эльдарка тянется к оружию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "О Иша, Мать всех живых, да защитит твое благословение Детей Азуриана от мерзости телесных и духовных мук..." {n}Подрагивающей рукой эльдарка тянется к оружию.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О Иша, Мать всех живых, да защитит твое благословение Детей Азуриана от мерзости телесных и духовных мук..." {n}Подрагивающей рукой эльдарка тянется к оружию.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, Isha, madre de todo lo que vive, bendice y protege a los hijos de Asuryan de las abominaciones de la tortura física y espiritual...». {n}La mano de la Aeldari se crispa al extenderla para sacar el arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Oh, Isha, madre de todo lo que vive, bendice y protege a los hijos de Asuryan de las abominaciones de la tortura física y espiritual...». {n}La mano de la Aeldari se crispa al extenderla para sacar el arma.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「おお、イシャ、すべての生命の母よ。あなたのご加護でアシュリアンの御子らを忌まわしき肉体と精神の拷問からお守りください」{n}武器を取ろうとした時、アエルダリの手がピクリと動いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「おお、イシャ、すべての生命の母よ。あなたのご加護でアシュリアンの御子らを忌まわしき肉体と精神の拷問からお守りください」{n}武器を取ろうとした時、アエルダリの手がピクリと動いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “噢，爱莎，众生之母啊，愿你的祝福保护阿苏焉之子免受肉体与精神折磨……”{n}当伊莉耶特拔出武器时，她的手颤抖了一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，爱莎，众生之母啊，愿你的祝福保护阿苏焉之子免受肉体与精神折磨……”{n}当伊莉耶特拔出武器时，她的手颤抖了一下。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ô Isha, Mère de toute vie, protégez par votre bénédiction les enfants d'Asuryan des abominations de la torture spirituelle et corporelle... » {n}La main de l'Aeldari se contracte lorsqu'elle la porte à son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ô Isha, Mère de toute vie, protégez par votre bénédiction les enfants d'Asuryan des abominations de la torture spirituelle et corporelle... » {n}La main de l'Aeldari se contracte lorsqu'elle la porte à son arme.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Oh Isha, Mutter allen Lebens, möge Euer Segen die Kinder von Asuryan vor den Abscheulichkeiten körperlicher und geistiger Folter beschützen ..." {n}Die Hand der Aeldari zuckt, als würde sie nach ihrer Waffe greifen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh Isha, Mutter allen Lebens, möge Euer Segen die Kinder von Asuryan vor den Abscheulichkeiten körperlicher und geistiger Folter beschützen ..." {n}Die Hand der Aeldari zuckt, als würde sie nach ihrer Waffe greifen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ey İşa, hayatın Anası... Lütfun Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nı hem bedenî hem de ruhani menfur işkencelerden korusun..." {n}Aeldari'nin eli, silahına doğru giderken seğiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "O Isha, Mother of all life, may your blessing protect the Children of Asuryan from the abominations of bodily and spiritual torture..." {n}The Aeldari's hand twitches as she reaches for her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ey İşa, tüm hayatın Annesi... Lütfun Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nı hem bedensel hem de ruhsal menfur işkencelerden korusun..." {n}Aeldari'nin eli, silahına doğru giderken seğiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
